- Location: exterior wall near foundation in side yard; window low to ground.  
- Materials/condition: stucco siding; concrete steps; white window trim showing some weathering.  
- Vegetation/encroachment: large palm with dead fronds overhanging wall and window; prune back to reduce moisture retention.  
- Moisture signs: green staining/mildew at base of stucco; soil/moss buildup near foundation.  
- Debris/obstructions: old folding chair and miscellaneous items cluttering area; remove for access and pest control.  
- Obstruction/hazard: black metal strip/post leaning against wall; secure or remove.
